description: Join the bears for a beautiful day at the beach and an energizing hike in the mountains with our “Bear Family Vacations” puzzle duo! What’s your favorite vacation place? The Brown bear family is spending a week at the beach, soaking up the sun and enjoying cool drinks and yummy snacks. Always ready for an adventure, the Honey bears chose to hike the trails and take in the breathtaking views from the tops of mountain peaks. Our “Bear Family Vacations” puzzle duo helps children develop hand-eye coordination, fine motor skills and problem-solving through repeated practice while delivering tons of fun! Our 24-piece puzzles have extra-large, durable pieces little hands can easily hold for lots of repeat fun, and come with handy, full-size picture guides! Clean-cut pieces and Ravensburger’s tight interlocking fit provide a pleasurable puzzling experience for children and their adult helpers alike.
